description: This file is the entry point for a React-based frontend application, responsible for rendering the root 'App' component into the DOM element with id 'root'. It includes imports for React, ReactDOM, styles, and the main App component, and utilizes React's createRoot API to set up the rendering.
published: default export of App components (imported as 'App')

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the root element.
